definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Some of you are probably already scratching your heads.
sentences.chinese: 有些讀者可能已經在撓頭了。

sentences.english: Other networks have wrestled with the same issues.
sentences.chinese: 而別的電視網正在爲同樣的問題撓頭。

sentences.english: The decision has left many scratching their heads.
sentences.chinese: 這一決定令很多人直撓頭皮感到困惑。

sentences.english: Under stage Zhang Hanyu shames adeptly scratches the head.
sentences.chinese: 臺下的張涵予羞得拿手撓頭。

sentences.english: Economists are scratching their heads to explain the price jump.
sentences.chinese: 如何解釋肉價暴漲讓經濟學家撓頭不已。

sentences.english: Mr. Bailey was searching for Mrs. McKinley and scratching his head.
sentences.chinese: 貝利先生正在找麥麗金夫人，也正在爲此事而撓頭。

sentences.english: On the girl's shoulder sat a little marmoset scratching its head comically.
sentences.chinese: 在女孩的肩膀上坐着一隻正在撓頭的小猴子。
